# Project 1 Interactive Demo

This page showcases **client-side interactivity** using Plotly and DT.

```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(plotly)
library(DT)

df <- data.frame(
  x = 1:20,
  y = cumsum(rnorm(20))
)

p <- plot_ly(df, x = ~x, y = ~y, type = "scatter", mode = "lines+markers")

datatable(df, options = list(pageLength = 5))

```
